not_found_description: The link you're trying to access does not exist
no_account: You don't have an account? Create one for free
who_are_you: Wait a minute! Who ... Are ... You?
set_budget_category: Set a budget for this category
choose_icon_description: choose an icon to make your category stand out
carousel_1_description: BudgetManager offers you to have an insight on your balance safely since you don't have to link your bank account nor any other form of payment.
carousel_2_description: Record how you spend your money and See them in one place. BudgetManager will remember them for you.
carousel_3_description: Get our help to free you from unnecessary expenses, only spend your money on essential matters, thus, bringing you order in your calendar.
section_1_description: By having an account, you can access to your data from any device accross the world
section_2_description: Take advantage of the highly customizable categories according to how you live
section_3_description: Get an insight of how you spend your money and get reminders of your bills
choose_currency: Choose the currency to use in the app
choose_language: Choose the language in which the application should display
name: name
expenses_description: You can choose to display all the expenses of all cycle or a particular one
allow_popups: Please! Make sure that pop-ups are allowed on this site
export_data_description: You can export this data to a spreadsheet
choose_cycle_description: Select a cycle to display the data from
museum_data: Here is the museum of your data
categories_page_description: Here is the list of the categories on which you can spend your BudgetManager money
no_data_available_description: Please! make sure that you have used the application for at least 1/4 of your choosen cycle (eg: one week for a monthly cycle, two days for a weekly cycle, ...)
help_set_category_budget: set a budget for this category
help_set_category_budget_description: click on the category's icon to toggle the options to set up a budget
help_see_all_categories_description: Only a limit of three(3) categories are displayed, click here to see all your categories
help_main_budget_description: Insert the total amount you want to use here.
help_renewal_frequency_description: Choose how long your cycle would last, set the value to custom to fully customize your cycle
help_start_date_description: Your cycle will start on this date, you won't have to touch it **if you want to choose a particular date to start your cycle, set the renewal frequency to [custom], then, change the end date value to your desired start date, the app will reset on that date, thus, making it the new start date**
help_next_renewal_date_description: Your cycle will be reset on this date, but you can access to your history in the **Overview** and/or the **Expenses** page
help_create_category_content: Create a category by clicking on this button and get options for customization
help_categories_content: These are just default generated categories, you can delete them or customize them
help_edit_category_content: You can edit this category by clicking on this button
budget_per_category_content: These are the categories you customized earlier, you have to set a budget limit for each category in order to use them
session_over_body: You have been disconnected, reconnect again using your identifiers
language_changed_body: Your current language has been updated
action_saved: Your action has been saved successfuly
click_to_help_description: This button will glow if help is available on your current page, you can see the tutorials again by clicking here
categories_limited_content: Here shows the list of your categories maxed at three (3) items
recent_expenses_content: Three of your recent expenses will be displayed here
overview_content: Click here to see a graph of your data when it's available
quick_register_expense_content: You can quickly register an expense by providing the gist of the informations here, you can complete the informations later if you want to
expenses_list_content: Your expenses are displayed here, click on a row to edit or delete an expense
available_budget: Available budget left for this category
